<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81304</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4709</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Der Besuch</string>
            <string language="es">Der Besuch</string>
            <string language="ga">Der Besuch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Besuch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Der Besuch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Der Besuch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Der Besuch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Der Besuch</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Based on the 1995 Leaving Certificate higher level literary text "der Besuch". Examination type comprehension questions, followed by written and oral tasks examining the role of the elderly in society.</string>
            <string language="es">Basado en el texto literario de nivel superior “der Besuch" del Certificado Leaving de 1995. Tipo de examen con preguntas de comprensión, seguidas de tareas escritas y orales, que examinan la función de las personas mayores en la sociedad.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bunaithe ar “der Besuch”, téacs liteartha a bhí ar scrúdú ardleibhéil na hArdteiste i 1995. Ceisteanna scrúdaithe léamhthuisceana, chomh maith le tascanna scríofa agus béil a scrúdaíonn ról na n-aosach sa sochaí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">German</string>
            <string language="es">Alemán</string>
            <string language="ga">Gearmáinis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading/Lesen</string>
            <string language="es">Lectura/Lesen. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Léitheoireacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auf der 1995 verlassenden Bescheinigung höhere 
Stufe gegründet literarischer Text "der Besuch". Prüfung Typ 
Erfassenfragen, gefolgt von den geschriebenen und Mundaufgaben, welche
die Rolle der älteren Personen in der Gesellschaft überprüfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Basé sur les 1995 certificats de fin d'études un
niveau plus élevé texte littéraire "der Besuch". Le type 
questions d'examen de compréhension, suivies d'écrit et orales 
charge examiner le rôle des personnes âgées dans la 
société.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Baseado no certificado 1995 sair o nível mais 
elevado texto literário "der Besuch". Tipo perguntas da 
examinação da compreensão, seguidas pelas tarefas escritas e orais 
que examinam o papel das pessoas idosas na sociedade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sulla base dei 1995 certificati andanti livello 
elevato testo letterario "der Besuch". Tipo domande dell'esame 
di comprensione, seguite dalle mansioni scritte ed orali che esaminano
il ruolo degli anziani nella società.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Με βάση το πιστοποιητικό αναχώρησης του 1995 πιό 
υψηλό επίπεδο λογοτεχνικό κείμενο "der Besuch". 
Ερωτήσεις κατανόησης τύπων εξέτασης, που ακολουθούνται από
τις γραπτές και προφορικές στοιχειώδεις εργασίες που εξετάζουν το
ρόλο των ηλικιωμένων στην κοινωνία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Deutsch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reading/Lesen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Allemand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Reading/Lesen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alemão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reading/Lesen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tedesco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reading/Lesen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γερμανικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάγνωση/Lesen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
